Nicolò Toscani
ProjectsBooksAbout

Projects

vibration-analysis

Vibration Analysis for Predictive Maintenance

Identify and predict failures in rotating machinery using high frequency vibration data to classify its behavior as normal or anomalous and generating alerts when not all system parameters are known.

The goals of the vibration-analysis project are:

  • Compare monitored values with the ISO 10816 standard
  • Create a model using differents machine learning techniques

edge-sentron

Application for SIMATIC WinCC Unified to read energy consumption from Siemens SENTRON series over Modbus TCP/IP

edge-sentron allows to acquire main energy measures from SIEMENS Sentron series and visualize them on HMI hiding fieldbus communication details and registers mapping.

node-red-contrib-siemens-sentron

Node-RED nodes to read electrical measures from Siemens SENTRON series over Modbus TCP/IP

node-red-contrib-siemens-sentron is a Plug and Play Node-RED node to simplify main energy data acquisition over Modbus TCP/IP from SIEMENS Sentron series.

CoAP-factory-monitoring

Industrial devices modelling using CoAP protocol and Californium framework

CoAP-factory-monitoring implements a possible IIoT scenario for factory data exchange in an Industry 4.0 perspective with CoAP protocol using Californium framework.

tiny-gate

Do you need to acquire data from your device easily and quickly? Try this template.

With tiny-gate you can collect data from your device using Modbus TCP/IP protocol and store these data into your database or forward them. You can use this template and adapt it with your system to get quick access on your device.

ModbusClient

Modbus TCP/IP client

ModbusClient is a Java application used to test the functionality of the Modbus TCP/IP protocol by exchanging messages with a server. The application uses the functionality of EasyModbusTCP.Java library.

node-red-contrib-schneider-powerlogic

A Node-RED nodes to read Schneider PowerLogic series over Modbus TCP/IP

node-red-contrib-schneider-powerlogic is a Plug and Play Node-RED node to simplify main energy data acquisition over Modbus TCP/IP from Schneider PowerLogic series through Ethernet gateway.

node-red-contrib-vibration-severity

Node-RED node for evaluating vibration velocity severity based on ISO10816 guidance

node-red-contrib-vibration-severity is used to receive and evaluate RMS Velocity (Vrms) from vibration sensor to identify a problem of unbalaced load, misalignment, loose mounting, soft foot, etc.

Android Optical Character Recognition

Android application for Optical Character Recognition and Optical Character Verification

OCR is an Android application for text detection that uses OpenCV for image enhancement and Google Tesseract Engine for optical character recognition. It’s possibile analyze an image loaded from device gallery or through live frames acquired by the camera. In both cases you can enhance the image to improve character recognition using:

  • Smoothing filters
  • Sharpening filters
  • Gray scale conversion
  • Histogram equalization
  • Rescaling
  • Binarization
  • Morphological transformations

openfieldbus

Industrial Automation communication protocol

openfieldbus contains an analysis of the most common communication protocols used in Industrial Automation:

  • Modbus TCP/IP
  • EtherNet/IP
  • Ethercat
